short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disign Web Player Extension enhances and develops Disign Web Player features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension unlocks several features of the Disign Web Player: https://disign.tv

- All web pages work
- Components that communicate with APIs or need to download assets are no longer blocked by a browser limitation (CORS)
- Screenshot from the Disign Studio portal
- Advanced device monitoring from the Disign Studio portal

To use this extension (after installing it), you must go to the Disign Web Player page: https://player.disign.tv and register it.

1. Log in to your account in Disign Studio
2. Go to "Players" and select "Player Code" on the player you want.
3. Enter the code displayed in the Disign Web Player.
4. Click "Submit". The Player should register automatically.

The Disign Web Player allows you to use and test our Disign platform very quickly without the additional cost of a physical Player.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact our support team!
